50 class cyclic_error_correction_lookup_table
51 {
52 public:
53 
54  // I wish I could use std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::min()/max() instead of the magic value
55  enum { range_min = SHRT_MIN };
56  enum { range_max = SHRT_MAX };
57 
58  cyclic_error_correction_lookup_table();
59  ~cyclic_error_correction_lookup_table() {}
60 
67  bool generate(const DepthSense::ROM::CyclicErrorCorrectionData& algorithm_info);
68  inline DepthSense::ROM::CyclicErrorCorrectionData& get_current_algorithm_info() { return current_algorithm_info; }
69 
75  inline int16_t operator[](int16_t index) { return lookup_table_ptr[index]; }
76  inline const std::vector<int16_t, DepthSense::Utils::aligned_allocator<int16_t, 32>>& get_current_lookup_table() { return current_lookup_table; }
77 
78 protected:
79  DepthSense::ROM::CyclicErrorCorrectionData current_algorithm_info;
80  std::vector<int16_t, DepthSense::Utils::aligned_allocator<int16_t, 32> > current_lookup_table;
81 
82  // This pointer points to the middle of the lookup table so that we avoid having to subtract range_min when addressing the lookup element
83  int16_t* lookup_table_ptr;
84 };
